member.summary: Returns whether this converter can convert the object to the specified type, using the specified context.

A System.Type that represents the type you want to convert to.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Olap.Xmla.XmlaDataSource.XmlaDataSourceTypeConverter.ConvertTo(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.Object,System.Type)
member.summary: Converts the given value object to the specified type, using the specified context and culture information.
member.param: An System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext that provides a format context.
A System.Globalization.CultureInfo. If null is passed, the current culture is assumed.
The System.Type to convert the value parameter to.
member.returns: An System.Object that represents the converted value.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Olap.Xmla.XmlaInitialSettings
member.summary: Class which exposes properties used to specify the initial data contained within the associated data source.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Olap.Xmla.XmlaInitialSettings.ServerUrl
member.summary: Returns or sets a string value which defines the URL (universal resource locator) for the associated OLAP server.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Olap.Xmla.XmlaInitialSettings.Username
member.summary: Returns or sets the username for server authentication.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Olap.Xmla.XmlaInitialSettings.Password

member.name: P:Infragistics.Olap.Xmla.XmlaInitialSettings.Domain
